title: The Trump arrest saga in 70 seconds
content: This video can not be playedDonald Trump will be charged with a crime over an alleged hush money payment to former porn star Stormy Daniels. The former US President posted about his arrest and kicked off a political and legal firestorm.The BBC's New York Correspondent Nada Tawfik explains what may happen now that the unprecedented has happened - a former president being arrested in a criminal case.
